data.quote: You can have everything you want in life if you just help enough people get what they want in life.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: If I have the belief that I can do it, I shall surely acquire the capacity to do it even if I may not have it at the beginning.
data.author: Gandhi

data.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
data.author: E. E. Cummings

data.quote: Great minds have great purposes, others have wishes. Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above them.
data.author: Washington Irving

data.quote: The start is what stops most people.
data.author: Don Shula

data.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you desing for the present.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: The ordinary focus on what they’re getting. The extraordinary think about who they’re becoming.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says ‘I’m possible!
data.author: Audrey Hepburn

data.quote: Sometimes we need to be hurt in order to grow. We must lose in order to gain. Sometimes some lessons are learned best through pain.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: I can is 100 times more important than IQ.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Give without remembering and always receive without forgetting.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Replace fear of the unknown, with curiosity.
data.author: Dany Gokey

data.quote: Turn your can’t into a can, and your dream  into plan!
data.author: Cris Nikolov

data.quote: So many people can be responsible for your success,  but only you are responsible for your failure.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: There are two types of Pain in this world: Pain that hurts you, and Pain that changes you!
data.author: Unknown
